mapper.select: select * from gallery order by gallery_count desc limit 6
mapper.insert: insert into gallery (member_idx, gallery_title, gallery_content) values (#{member_idx}, #{gallery_title}, #{gallery_content})
mapper.update: update gallery set gallery_title = #{gallery_title}, gallery_content = #{gallery_content} where gallery_idx = #{gallery_idx}
mapper.delete: delete from image where img_big_category = 'gallery' and img_small_category = #{objGIdx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from gallery where gallery_title like CONCAT('%',#{search_keyword},'%')
